help-file.title: "RAISE WRAITH"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <corpse> Aggressive: No Cumulative: No Duration: Animation lasts until undead follower dies (again) Type of spell: Summoning
If the Necromancer has a suitable corpse at his feet, "Raise Wraith" causes the corpse to return to existence as a wraith. Wraiths by nature are Sorcerers, but their power varies from animation to animation. They are somewhat physically weak and cannot withstand much damage to their fragile forms, but they have the potential to be deadly foes.
